players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I believe we should focus on finding out who among us is the mafioso. Let's be vigilant and pay close attention to each other's actions and statements."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. Let's work together to identify the mafioso and keep our town safe."

Bob: "Based on the events of last night, it's clear that we need to work together to identify and root out the mafioso in our midst. Let's all be open and honest with each other during this investigation."
Diana: "Let's continue our efforts to uncover the identity of the mafioso. I believe that open communication and collaboration will be key in solving this mystery."
